text: Asseco Poland S.A. is a Polish company in the technology sector, the biggest in Warsaw Stock Exchange. Its headquarters are in Rzesz√≥w, Poland. ==History== It was founded in 1991. The company works in Poland, Slovakia, the Czech Republic, Austria, Lithuania, Germany, Romania, Hungary, Spain, United States, Israel, Japan, Turkey and the Balkans. ==References== Category:Technology companies of Europe Category:Companies of Poland Category:1991 establishments in Poland
title: Asseco
